attributes.action: Stop The BBC From Giving Away License Fee Money In Game Shows
attributes.additional_details:
Stop the BBC from the obscene practice of giving away license fee payers money to various game/quiz shows right in front of our eyes each day.
It is totally immoral to watch our hard earned money being given away In various shows every day, especially in these times of severe austerity.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the BBC, not the Government.
